Package photos.controller

Class nonAdminController

java.lang.Object
photos.controller.nonAdminController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class nonAdminController extends Object implements Serializable
The controller for the main screen when logged in with a non admin user, provides basic functionalities
Since:
4/13/23
Author:
Zihao Zheng , Yiming Huang

    • checkExistence

      public boolean checkExistence(String name)
      Checks if an album with the specified name exists in the current user's list of albums. If an album with the same name exists, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the album to check for existence
      Returns:
      true if an album with the specified name exists in the current user's list of albums, false otherwise

      public void deleteAlbum() throws IOException
      Deletes the album selected
      Throws:

    • tryDeleteFromFolder

      public void tryDeleteFromFolder(String storageDir, User user)
      Tries to delete photos from a given storage directory that do not belong to any album owned by the user. It first reads all photos from the directory, creates Photo objects for each photo, and adds them to a static list of all photos. Then it calls the static method findOrphan() of the Photo class to find photos that do not belong to any album owned by the user. If a photo does not belong to any album, it is deleted from the directory.
      Parameters:
      storageDir - the directory where the photos are stored
      user - the user whose albums will be checked to see if they own the photos

    • deleteFile

      public boolean deleteFile(String filePath)
      Deletes a file from the file system.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path of the file to delete
      Returns:
      true if the file was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • moveToTrash

      public boolean moveToTrash(String filePath)
      Moves a file to the trash or the recycle bin. If moving the file fails, deletes the file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path of the file to move to the trash/recycle bin
      Returns:
      true if the file was successfully moved to the trash/recycle bin or deleted, false otherwise

    • openAlbum

      public void openAlbum() throws IOException
      Opens the selected album and displays its contents in a new window. If no album is selected, a warning alert is displayed.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the album view FXML file.

    • logoutHandler

      public void logoutHandler() throws IOException
      Logouts the current user and go back to the login screen
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the login view FXML file.

    • searchPhoto

      public void searchPhoto() throws IOException, ParseException
      Searches for photos in the current user's albums based on either a tag or a date range.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an issue with input or output
      ParseException - if there is an issue parsing the date
